Description: Pottery: bowl of Eastern sigillata B ware, stamped 'Αλεξάνδρον by the potter Alexandros. It has the owner's name, Tumychos TYMINXOC, scratched underneath, in a half-circle.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Torre Annunziata (said to be from)
Curator's comments: Roman Pottery Shape as Holder, Formen der rom. Thongef. pl. 20, No. 11.
Bibliographic references: Roman Pottery / Catalogue of the Roman Pottery in the British Museum (L135)
